supermind.getPaid: Get paid to reply to your fans.

producer.title: Get paid to reply to your fans.

1.title: How to earn
1.subtitle: Fans send offers of cash and tokens, which you earn by simply replying. Minds collects just a 15% platform fee (vs. 30% fees on other platforms), and our payment processor charges a small fee per transaction.
1.subtitle-iOS: Fans send offers, which you earn by simply replying. Minds collects just a 10% platform fee (vs. 30% fees on other platforms), and our payment processor charges a small fee per transaction. See terms & conditions.

2.title: It's your content
2.subtitle: Your replies are public for all of your followers, so everyone benefits from the interaction.

3.title: Limitations
3.subtitle: Once you accept an offer, your reply can't be deleted. And NSFW content is currently not supported with Supermind.

consumer.title: Get replies from your favorite creators by sending them paid offers.
consumer.title-iOS: Get replies from your favorite creators by sending them token offers.

1.title: Set an offer amount
1.subtitle: Send an offer of cash or tokens. The creator earns the offer amount when they reply.
1.subtitle-iOS: Send an offer of tokens. The creator earns the offer amount when they reply.

2.title: Prompt with a public post
2.subtitle: You'll make a new public post that the target creator can reply to.

3.title: Get a reply
3.subtitle: Creators have 7 days to reply to your post. You will not be charged if they do not reply.

confirm.title: Confirm reply
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to post this reply? Once posted your reply cannot be deleted.

wallet.phoneValidationMessage: To start earning rewards, you will need to enter a unique phone number.

learnMore.title: Learn More
learnMore.howWork: How the new rewards system works
learnMore.p1: Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.
learnMore.p2: Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a â€œDaily Reward Poolâ€. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.
learnMore.p3: Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a â€œContribution Scoreâ€ which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.
learnMore.p4: It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
learnMore.p5: Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your OffChain address.
learnMore.howContributionsP: We calculate your contribution score each day using the following weighted scoring system. Please note that the new system only gives credit for unique engagement (users who have provided a mobile number), so not all engagement you receive will be factored into your score.
learnMore.onChainP1: OffChain tokens are stored on Minds servers, and they can be used the same way that you used your Points. There are no fees, and they can be used to Boost content for more views from the network or to Wire other creators who you support.
learnMore.onChainP2: You now have the ability to withdraw these tokens into your OnChain address.
learnMore.onChainP3: OnChain tokens are stored on the Ethereum public blockchain and are accessible from outside of the Minds platform, which is key for further decentralization. OnChain transactions, however, require a small Ethereum â€œgasâ€ fee, which is the incentive for the Ethereum miners to process the transaction.
learnMore.onChainP4: For OnChain configuration, you have the ability to use MetaMask (a browser plugin), your mobile device, an existing Ethereum address or you can create your own with Minds. We recommend using MetaMask for the most seamless user experience. You can change this address by clicking on the â€œAddressesâ€ tab on the wallet menu

tooltips.LiquidityTradedVolume: Total volume traded on Uniswap in the past 24 hours
tooltips.EngagementScore: The total number of points generated by the community for receiving engagement on their posts in the past 24 hours
tooltips.HoldingScore: The total number of points generated by the community for holding tokens on-chain in the past 24 hours
tooltips.LiquidityScore: The total number of points generated by the community for providing liquidity in the past 24 hours
tooltips.EmissionBreakDown: A summary of how many tokens are rewarded each day and how they are allocated
tooltips.CirculatingSupply: The number of tokens circulating in the community
tooltips.MarketCap: The circulating supply multiplied by the current market price of the token
tooltips.TokenHolders: The total number of users who have ever held a token
tooltips.TokensReclaimed: The total number of tokens reclaimed by Minds for providing services
tooltips.TokensRewarded: The total number of tokens rewarded to the community
tooltips.TotalSupply: The total number of tokens that can ever exist
tooltips.TransactionsCount: The total number of token transactions in the past 24 hours
tooltips.TransactionsUnique: The total number of unique users who have performed a token transaction in the past 24 hours
tooltips.TransactionsVolume: The total volume of tokens exchanged in the past 24 hours

monetize.title: Monetize
monetize.plusDescription: Support Minds and unlock features such as earning revenue for your content, hiding ads, accessing exclusive content, receiving a badge and verifying your channel.
monetize.proTitle: A new revenue model for creators
monetize.proDescription: Get paid for your traffic and referrals, launch your own website, receive multi-currency tips and subscription payments from fans and much more.
monetize.subScreensTitle: Last month Pro creators earned over $2,500!

plusMonetize.notPlus: Youâ€™ll need to upgrade to Minds+ in order to submit your post to the Minds+ content pool. You will earn revenue based on the performance of the content.

customMonetize.usd: Contribution in USD (will be converted to tokens if necessary)

referrals.title: Earn tokens by inviting your friends to Minds
referrals.sendLinkToFriends: Send this link to your friends to earn tokens for referrals
referrals.codeSuffixLabel: You can also get referrals by adding this code to the end of any Minds link you share
referrals.noReferrals: You don't have any referrals yet.
referrals.description: If your friend signs up for Minds within 24 hours of clicking the link you shared with them, theyâ€™ll be added to your pending referrals. Once they sign up for the rewards program by setting up their Minds wallet, the referral is complete and youâ€™ll both get +10 added to your contribution scores!

socialCompass.promptDesc: Take control of your social media. Your preferences will improve your Discovery and similar feeds. But don't worry, it won't impact your default newsfeed.

socialCompass.thanks: Thank you for your feedback and supporting the Minds Community
